head.name: hylian hood
head.description: A hood woven using traditional Hyrulean methods. It's made from a sturdy material to protect travelers from the harsh sun and weather.

body.name: hylian tunic
body.description: A common garb that achieved widespread popularity in Hyrule, particularly among travelers. Its light-yet-sturdy fabric doesn't limit movement.

legs.name: hylian trousers
legs.description: Traditional dress trousers of Hyrule. The plush fabric makes these trousers quite comfortable, and their high durability makes them ideal for travelers.

head.name: cap of the wild
head.description: According to legend, this cap was crafted for a hero who traves the wild lands. Wearing it just feels so right.

body.name: tunic of the wild
body.description: This armor was apparently crafted for a hero who travels the wilds. Strangely enough, it's just your size.

legs.name: trousers of the wild
legs.description: Legends say these pants were tailored for a hero who travels the wilderness. Strangely enough, they’re the most comfortable pair of pants you’ve ever worn.

head.name: zora helm
head.description: Zora headgear made from dragon scales. Increases swimming speed and allows you to spin to attack while swimming.

body.name: zora armor
body.location: Armor crafted by a past Zora princess for her future husband. Equip it to swim up waterfalls.

legs.name: zora greaves
legs.description: These greaves have been passed down among the Zora for generations. Equip them to swim faster.

head.name: desert voe headband
head.description: Gerudo armor for males. Contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable.

body.name: desert voe spaulder
body.description: Armor for males sold rarely by Gerudo retailers. It contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make hot climates more tolerable.

legs.name: desert voe trousers
legs.description: Gerudo-made trousers for males sold rarely by Gerudo retailers. Sapphire is used in their creation, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more tolerable.

head.name: snowquill headdress
head.description: A Rito accessory made from snow-bird feathers. Adorned with a ruby, a gem that harnesses the power of fire.

body.name: snowquill tunic
body.description: Made by Rito artisans, this tunic stacks molted Rito feathers in each layer to help retain body heat.

legs.name: snowquill trousers
legs.description: The Rito feathers that line these trousers make them excellent at retaining body heat.

head.name: flamebreaker helm
head.description: Stone headgear made for tourists by Goron crafters. Not only is is flame resistant but it also covers your entire head.

legs.name: flamebreaker boots
legs.description: Goron artisans used flame-resistant rocks to craft these fireproof boots for curious Hylians visiting Goron City.

body.name: flamebreaker armor
body.description: Fire-resistant armor crafted by Gorons for Hylians curious enough to visit Goron City.

head.name: stealth mask
head.description: A Sheikah-made mask that suppresses the noisy rustling of clothes. Perfect for sneaking about.

legs.name: stealth tights
legs.description: Armor designed for stealth, passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Its special fabric suppresses sound.

body.name: stealth chest guard
body.description: Tights crafted by the Sheikah, laced with ancient technology that suppresses the noisy rustling of clothes.

head.name: climber's bandana
head.description: It may look like a regular bandana, but it's actually infused with ancient technology that enhances core strength to improve your climbing ability.

legs.name: climbing boots
legs.description: The ancient technology in this gear will make you a better climber. The special no-slip gloves helps you use your energy more efficiently to facilitate nimble climbing.

body.name: climbing gear
body.description: These rock-climbing boots have special no-slip toes that help you cling to walls. This ancient technology facilitates more nimble climbing.

head.name: radiant mask
head.description: A mask made from crushed luminous stones that gives off a radiant glow in the dark.

legs.name: radiant tights
legs.description: Paint made from crushed luminous stones causes these tights to glow in the dark.

body.name: radiant shirt
body.description: A shirt that glows in the dark due to dye made from luminous stones.

head.name: soldier's helm
head.description: Headgear made from sturdy metals for frontline soldiers. Praised for their defensive capabilities, the only helms that remain are those that survived the Calamity.

legs.name: soldier's greaves
legs.description: Hyruliean guards favored these greaves. They owe their distinctly high defense to the metal plates they're made from, but the added weight takes some getting used to.

body.name: soldier's armor
body.description: Hyruliean guards praised this armor for its superior defense. Made from sturdy plates of metal, the high level of craftsmanship that went into it is obvious with just a glance.

head.name: bokoblin mask
head.description: Kilton's handmade Bokoblin headgear. It's almost charming in a cute, monstrous kind of way... Equip it to blend in with Bokoblins.

head.name: diamond circlet
head.description: A Gerudo headpiece set with a diamond, which increases attack power.

head.name: ruby circlet
head.description: A headpiece made by Gerudo craft workers. It's set with a ruby, a gem that harnesses the power of fire to make cold climates more bearable.

head.name: sapphire circlet
head.description: An intricate headpiece crafted with Gerudo goldsmith techniques. It's set with a sapphire, a gem that harnesses the power of ice to make hot climates more tolerable.

head.name: topaz earrings
head.description: Earrings made by Gerudo craft workers. They're made with topaz, a gem that harnesses the power of lighting to increase electricity resistance.

head.name: opal earrings
head.description: Earrings sold at Gerudo jewelry shops. They contain opal, a gem that harnesses the power of water to increase your swimming speed.

head.name: amber earrings
head.description: One of the items sold by the Gerudo jeweler. These earrings are made with amber, a gem that harnesses the power of the land to increase defense when equipped.

head.name: moblin mask
head.description: Kilton's handmade Moblin headgear. It's designed to replicate the distinct, long, Moblin nose and hanging tongue. Equip it to blend in with Moblins.

head.name: rubber helm
head.description: An electricity-resistant helmet made from an ancient material called "rubber."

legs.name: rubber tights
legs.description: These invaluable tights are resistant to electricity. They're made with an ancient technology called "rubber."

body.name: rubber armor
body.description: This armor owes its electricity resistance to an ancient material called "rubber," which is nearly impossible to find.

head.name: barbarian helm
head.description: A helmet once worn by the warriors of an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region.

legs.name: barbarian leg wraps
legs.description: Leg wraps once favored by a warlike tribe. The traditional design bolsters your fighting spirit to raise your strength.

body.name: barbarian armor
body.description: Armor once favored by an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region. Equipping it boosts your attack power.

legs.name: sand boots
legs.description: Gerudo artisans modified these boots for life in the desert. The special soles distribute weight evenly so you can maintain your normal movement speed on sand.

head.name: lizalfos mask
head.description: Kilton's handmade Lizalfos headgear. It's designed to replicate even those goggling eyeballs of the Lizalfos. Equip it to blend in with Lizalfos.

head.name: lynel mask
head.description: Kilton's handmade Lynel headgear. It's so well crafted it can deceive a real Lynel. Equip it to blend in with Lynels, but don't linger long. Those beasts are smart.

head.name: glide mask
head.description: A mask with a wind-resistant design that allows for steadier gliding while the wearer plummets from the sky.

legs.name: glide tights
legs.description: The cloth sewn to these tights allows their wearer to glide more easily as they plummet from the sky.

body.name: glide shirt
body.description: The cloth sewn to this shirt helps it "catch" air, increasing the wearer's ability to glide while plummeting from the sky.

head.name: ancient hero's aspect
head.description: This item is said to contain the spirit of a hero who once saved Hyrule. That hero's aura will envelop the wearer.

head.name: archaic tunic
head.description: Old-fashioned upper-body wear. It's got some holes, but the soft cloth feels good to the touch. It's hard to keep wrinkle-free.

legs.name: archaic legwear
legs.description: Simple, classic legwear. They're well-worn and showing their age, but they've still got a few good years left in them. It can be a bit cumbersome to have to tie the straps.

legs.name: archaic warm greaves
legs.description: Warm greaves believed to be from a very long time ago. Despite the old look, the heat-retaining material makes it pleasantly resistant to cold temperatures.

head.name: froggy hood
head.description: A good hood for a rainy day. The perfectly weighted headband keeps the wearer focus and stabilized, making it easier to climb wet, slippery surfaces.

legs.name: froggy leggings
legs.description: Good leggings for a rainy day. The feet are covered in small dimples and treated with an anti-slip substance, giving them great traction on wet, slippery surfaces.

body.name: froggy sleeve
body.description: A good sleeve for a rainy day. Small dimples on the fingers act as suction cups, giving good grip on wet, slippery surfaces.

head.name: miner's mask
head.description: A mask used for working in darkness. The attached lamps are filled with bioluminescent material to light one's surroundings.

legs.name: miner's trousers
legs.description: The bioluminescent lamps on these trousers shed light on where you step. They come in handy when walking in darkness.

body.name: miner's top
body.description: A shirt featuring lamps of various sizes filled with bioluminescent material. Made to help with excavating dark environments.

head.name: ember headdress
head.description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

legs.name: ember trousers
legs.description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

body.name: ember shirt
body.description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

head.name: charged headdress
head.description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

legs.name: charged trousers
legs.description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

body.name: charged shirt
body.description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

head.name: frostbite headdress
head.description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

legs.name: frostbite trousers
legs.description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

body.name: frostbite shirt
body.description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

head.name: cece hat
head.description: An avant-garde masterpiece designed by Cece. Guaranteed to make the fashionistas heads turn.

head.name: mystic headpiece
head.description: Headgear acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Made with prayers spirits, it protects the wear allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

legs.name: mystic trousers
legs.description: Trousers acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Each thread is blessed by spirits, protecting the wearer by allowig them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

body.name: mystic robe
body.description: A robe acquired in exchange for, Bubbul gems. Woven with prayers to spirits, it protects the wearer, allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

head.name: zonaite helm
head.description: A helmet forged of zonaite. The magic infused into it during its production grants its wearer improved energy efficiency for Zonai devices.

legs.name: zonaite shin guards
legs.description: Shin guards forged of zonaite. Wearing them awakens the magic of their creators, improving efficiency for Zonai devices.

body.name: zonaite waistguard
body.description: A waistguard made from zonait hile wearing it, you'll reap the benefit of its imbued magic and improve the effieiency of Zonai devices.

head.name: mask of awakening
head.description: Legend says this mask resembles a hero who explored a mysterious place that one could visit but not leave.

legs.name: trousers of awakening
legs.description: Legend says these trousers were worn by a hero who explored a mysterious island that one could visit but not leave.

body.name: tunic of awakening
body.description: Legend says this armor was worn by a hero who explored a mysterious area that one could visit but not leave.

head.name: champion's leathers
head.description: This garment, worn by those in good standing with Hyrule royalty, has been reworked with the latest improvements, such a new shoulder guard.

head.name: horriblin mask
head.description: Kilton's handmade Horriblin headgear. The big nose and smiley mouth look just like those of the real monster... Equip it to blend in with Horriblins.'

head.name: hood of the depths
head.description: A hood acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. It offers some resistance to gloom.

legs.name: gaiters of the depths
legs.description: Gaiters acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. They offer some resistance to gloom.

body.name: tunic of the depths
body.description: A tunic acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. It offers some resistance to gloom.

head.name: well-worn hair band
head.description: An old, worn, simple hair band. Its color has long faded, but it still has some life left in it. Wearing it in your hair makes you sentimental about times past.

body.name: tunic of memories
body.description: In ancient Hyrule, this garment could only be worn by one who had earned the respect of the royal family. It’s dyed in vibrant blue.

head.name: yiga mask
head.description: A mask supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. It covers the entire face, keeping even breath sounds to a minimum. Perfect sneaking, but lacks protection due to its light material.

legs.name: yiga tights
legs.description: Tights supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. The soft material on the soles silences footsteps, but protection is lacking due to the light material.

body.name: yiga armor
body.description: Armor supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. Defensive parts are minimized for silence, so it's lacking in protection.

legs.name: snow boots
legs.description: Boots designed for hiking up snowy mountains. They evenly distribute your body weight so you can maintain your normal movement speed on deep snow.

head.name: dark hood
head.description: Headwear obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. It resembles the head of a monster born of shadow, and its eyes glow eerie red in the dark.

legs.name: dark trousers
legs.description: A tunic obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. It's a spurious replica of the green outfit once worn by a legendary hero.

body.name: dark tunic
body.description: Trousers obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. They look ordinary at first, but on closer inspection, they resemble the legs of a monster born of shadow.

head.name: phantom helmet
head.description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. This helmet looks just like the ones they supposedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

legs.name: phantom greaves
legs.description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. These greaves look just like the ones they supposedly wore. They're a rather rare find.

body.name: phantom armor
body.description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. This piece looks just like the armor they allegedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

head.name: majora's mask
head.description: An eerie mask passed down from ancient times. Wearing it makes it harder for certain enemies to spot you. It's a rather rare find.

head.name: midna's helmet
head.description: A helmet much like the one Midna wore when she fought alongside the Hero of Twilight. It's a rather rare find.

head.name: tingle's hood
head.description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

legs.name: tingle's tights
legs.description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

body.name: tingle's shirt
body.description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

body.name: island lobster shirt
body.description: A soft, comfortable shirt traditional to a southern island. It's made of breathable fabric, so it's well suited to warm regions.

head.name: korok mask
head.description: A mask inspired by those fun-loving Koroks. It shakes when one is nearby. It's a rather rare find.

head.name: ravio's hood
head.description: The hood of a traveling merchant who had a bracelet that could turn the wearer into a painting. Wearing it increases your sideways climbing speed. It's a rather rare find.

head.name: zant's helmet
head.description: The ruthless Usurper King of the Twilight Realm wore a helmet much like this one. It's a rather rare find.

head.name: royal guard cap
head.description: This spiffy cap is part of the uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. It's lighter than it looks and easy to move around in.

legs.name: royal guard boots
legs.description: These boots are part of the uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. They're a fine blend of style and function.

body.name: royal guard uniform
body.description: The dignified uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. It's made of high-quality materials and is both stylish and practical.

head.name: evil spirit mask
head.description: Some believe this eerie mask is inspired by a malevolent entity. It's a rather rare find.

legs.name: evil spirit greaves
legs.description: Some believe these greaves are inspired by a malevolent entity. They're a rather rare find.

body.name: evil spirit armor
body.description: Some believe this eerie mask is inspired by a malevolent entity. They're a rather rare find.

head.name: vah ruta divine helm
head.description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Zora in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Zora when worn by a Hylian.

head.name: vah medoh divine helm
head.description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Rito in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Rito when worn by a Hylian.

head.name: vah rudania divine helm
head.description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Gorons in a time beyond memory. It’s said to deepen the bond with the Gorons when worn by a Hylian.

head.name: vah naboris divine helm
head.description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Gerudo in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Gerudo when worn by a Hylian.

head.name: cap of time
head.description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. A truly timeless item perfect for kids and adults alike!

legs.name: trousers of time
legs.description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who traveled through time. They were originally made by a people who made their home in the forest.

body.name: tunic of time
body.description: Legend has it that this armor was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. Strangely, its special design is fitted for children and adults alike.

head.name: cap of the wind
head.description: According to legend, this cap was treasured by a hero who travelled the Great Sea. It flaps quite serenely in a soft sea breeze.

legs.name: trousers of the wind
legs.description: Legends say these trousers were cherished by a hero who sailed the Great Sea. They’re water-resistant, naturally.

body.name: tunic of the wind
body.description: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero who sailed the Great Sea. It’s said to have been a gift from his grandmother.

head.name: cap of twilight
head.description: According to legend, this cap was worn by a hero who battled the creatures of twilight.

legs.name: trousers of twilight
legs.description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who battled the beasts of twilight.

head.name: cap of the sky
head.description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding a mighty bird.

legs.name: trousers of the sky
legs.description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding a mighty bird.

body.name: tunic of the sky
body.description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who rode a mighty bird. It was apparently presented after a ceremonious event.

head.name: sheik's mask
head.description: A mask said to have been worn by a Sheikah who saved a time-traveling hero. Made from the finest of Sheikah stealth fabrics, it is the final word in undercover gear

head.name: fierce deity mask
head.description: A mask worn by a hero from a world in which the moon was falling, granting godlike power.

legs.name: fierce deity boots
legs.description: Boots worn by a hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing them provides godlike power.

body.name: fierce deity armor
body.description: Armor worn by the hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing it provides godlike power.

head.name: cap of the hero
head.description: According to legend, this cap was once treasures by an ancient hero. It’s quite the simple cap, yet there is something about it that’s just so appealing…

legs.name: trousers of the hero
legs.description: Legends say these trousers were favoured by a hero from an ancient age. Their simple design is a rare aesthetic these days, but there’s something classic about them.

body.name: tunic of the hero
body.description: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero from ancient times. Its design is rather simple, but it’s such a traditional look.
